name: SDA Main
description: Complete dual-audience solution documentation creation through multi-agent collaboration. Creates documents that satisfy both technical reviewers and business stakeholders.

name: Solution Investigation
description: Deep exploration and refinement of solution design before documentation begins. Uses Catalyst, Visionary, and Inventor for creative problem-solving.

name: Review Only
description: Adversarial review of existing solution documents from both customer and R&D perspectives. No new document creation - pure quality assurance.
